message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,100,000.  I'm open to discussing the price further, so please feel free to share your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your budget considerations, however, the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposal.  To move this forward, I'm willing to consider  $1,050,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with a proposal of $1,000,000. I hope this is within the range you can consider.
